1. The far right is using AI to sell Hitler to a new generation  The Washington Post

item.title: Microsoft to re-launch ‘privacy nightmare’ AI screenshot tool - BBC.com
item.description:
1. Microsoft to re-launch ‘privacy nightmare’ AI screenshot tool  BBC.com
